description: Small but very combustible, these fire starter cubes work with twigs, kindling or charcoal to start a campfire or barbeque.Virtually smokeless and residue-free solid fuel tablets work at high altitudes and sub-zero temperatures.Includes 12, 14g tablet that burn about 12 minutes each.One tablet boils 500ml of water in about 8 minutes.Waterproof packaging, unopened fuel can be stored for 10+ years.
name: Esbit Solid Fuel Tablets 12 x 14g
